Title: Increases the maximum amount of individual awards for the physician loan repayment program and physician practice support program
Summary: Increases the maximum amount of individual awards for the physician loan repayment program and physician practice support program to encourage physicians to practice in underserved areas.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-m, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the maximum amount of individual awards for the physician loan repayment program and physician practice support program
